event.title: Panel discussion about diversity and competition in the digital economy, Berlin, Germany
event.body: On Monday 23 February, Matthias Kirschner will participate in a panel discussion about the necessary general framework to foster diversity and competition in the digital economy. The panel discussion is part of an event organised by the Green party about market power, competition, and diversity in the digital economy (Marktmacht, Wettbewerb und Vielfalt in der digitalen Wirtschaft). It takes place in the German Parliament, Reichstagsgeb√§ude, Room RTG 3 N 039, Platz der Republik 1, 11011 Berlin from 16:00 - 20:00.
